projectDesc: Electrical substations  planning REST API services using python and FastAPI
In PokeMemory game the player are tasked to select one unique Pokemon each round. The game ends when the player selects the same Pokemon twice..
An ATS CV maker website helps job seekers create resumes optimized for Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS).

Battleship is a strategic two-player board game where opponents secretly position their fleet of ships on a grid. Players take turns calling out coordinates to target and sink each other's ships. The goal is to be the first to destroy the opponent's entire fleet.

This weather app has a simple and intuitive interface that let you get updates on temperature, humidity, wind speed and more on the current time and also 7 days daily forecast so you can plan your days ahead.

This Simple Todo List App is a straightforward and user-friendly application designed to help users organize their tasks efficiently. The project features a clean and intuitive user interface, allowing users to easily add, edit, and delete tasks.

Enjoy a classic game of Tic Tac Toe right in your browser! Simply click to place your X or O strategically on the grid, aiming to line up three in a row horizontally, vertically, or diagonally to claim victory. It's a timeless game of strategy and fun for all ages!
Keep your book collection organized with this easy-to-use browser app. Input and track your books effortlessly. Never lose track of your reads again!

This project is a minimalist yet inviting web design aimed at showcasing a restaurant's identity and enticing potential customers. The landing page features a clean and visually appealing layout, highlighting key elements such as the restaurant's logo, high-quality images of signature dishes, and a brief description of the cuisine.

This admin dashboard web page provides a centralized interface for managing and monitoring key aspects of a system or application. It presents this information in a visually organized manner, allowing administrators to easily navigate and perform tasks efficiently.

This landing page contains minimal navigation options and concise content aimed at capturing the visitor's attention and encouraging them to take the desired action. The design is clean and visually appealing, with clear messaging to guide visitors.

This Sign Up Form web page enables users to create accounts for accessing a service or platform. It includes input fields for information such as username, email address, password. The design is user-friendly with clear labels and instructions, as well as validation to ensure data accuracy.
